Package me.marcosassuncao.servsim.scheduler

Class BackfillingScheduler

java.lang.Object
me.marcosassuncao.servsim.SimEntity
me.marcosassuncao.servsim.scheduler.AbstractScheduler
me.marcosassuncao.servsim.scheduler.BackfillingScheduler
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventSink<SimEvent>, ListenerService<WorkUnitEvent,EventListener<WorkUnitEvent>>, Scheduler
Direct Known Subclasses:
AggrBackfillScheduler, ConsBackfillScheduler
public abstract class BackfillingScheduler extends AbstractScheduler
Abstract class with helper methods common across all backfilling policies.
Author:
Marcos Dias de Assuncao

  • Method Details

    • setSortingComparator

      public void setSortingComparator(Comparator<Job> comp)
      Sets the comparator used to sort the waiting queue in case a running job is cancelled. The new evaluation to check what jobs can start execution and how the remaining jobs are place in the queue depends on the sorting criteria specified by the given comparator
      Parameters:
      comp - the comparator used to sort the waiting queue

    • compressSchedule

      protected Collection<Integer> compressSchedule(long time)
      This method iterates the waiting jobs list and for each job, it returns the allocated time slot and resources to the pool.
      Parameters:
      time - consider jobs whose start time is further than time
      Returns:
      a collection with the IDs of the affected jobs
